name: Shlack!
description:
Description
Şlak! is a fast paced local multiplayer game of hamam (Turkish bath) fights with towels! Strong, fatty men with moustaches slap each other with towels until there is a winner.

A fun, entertaining game for 2-4 players that will make you want to belly dance!

Team

- Arda Çevik

- Çağdaş Yıldırım

- Hadi Çağdaş Erk

- Yasemin Baran

Development Notes

- Şlak! was developed during Microsoft Game Jam '15 at Bahçeşehir University Game Lab (BUG), Istanbul.

- Şlak!'s got first place on Microsoft Game Jam '15 Istanbul!
